# Directives Docs

> Documentation for Directives Docs.

*Topics available: 5*

- [#Const Directive](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/directives/const-directive.md): Learn more about: #Const Directive
- [Enable and Disable directives](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/directives/disable-enable.md): Learn more about: #Disable and #Enable directives (Visual Basic)
- [#ExternalSource Directive](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/directives/externalsource-directive.md): Learn more about: #ExternalSource Directive
- [#If...Then...#Else Directives](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/directives/if-then-else-directives.md): Learn more about: #If...Then...#Else Directives
- [#Region directive](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/directives/region-directive.md): Learn how to group related lines of code using region directives in Visual Basic.
